HOME.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to my portfolio. I am a developer who is not afraid of new challenges and loves learning new things.

ABOUT.TITLE: ABOUT ME
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to my personal page! Here, you can learn more about my background, hobbies, and experiences.

BIOGRAPHY.TITLE: Biography
BIOGRAPHY.DESCRIPTION: I was born in February 2003 in Žatec. I attended primary school there and later enrolled at the Secondary Industrial School in Chomutov, where I majored in Automation Systems. After successfully passing my matriculation exams, I continued my studies at the Faculty of Applied Sciences at the University of West Bohemia in Pilsen, where I am currently pursuing a degree in Informatics.

HOBBIES.TITLE: Hobbies
HOBBIES.DESCRIPTION: My hobbies include going to the gym, spending time with friends, listening to music, playing the guitar, and enjoying night drives.

PETS.TITLE: Pets
PETS.DESCRIPTION: I live with two cats, Lucifer and Foxy. Additionally, there is a hamster named Šmudlina living in Žatec.

WORK.TITLE: Work Experience
WORK.DESCRIPTION: Since April 2024, I have been working as a Trainee in the student lab at Eurosoftware S.R.O.

PROJECTS.TITLE: PROJECTS
PROJECTS.DESCRIPTION: Here you can find a selection of my projects. Click on the project to learn more about it.

CONTACT.TITLE: CONTACT ME
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Feel free to reach out to me! You can use the form below to send me a message or contact me through my social media profiles.
